meaningMnemonic: The <radical>fang</radical> radical and the <kanji>fang</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Fantastic. Oh, also it means <kanji>tusk</kanji>. It means fang and tusk.
readingMnemonic: Lots of animals have <kanji>fang</kanji>s, even ones that don't look like they do. The coolest fang-having animal is the <reading>ge</reading>cko (げ)! They have pretty sharp little fangs in their mouths and they'll bite you if you keep tapping their glass cages like that. Cut it out.
